t: Amazon unveils holiday windows at landmark site in NYC | Chain Store Age
s: December 4, 2024 - Amazon is keeping up one of New York City’s most iconic and time-honored traditions. The online giant has unveiled holiday window displays at its building on Fifth Avenue (424-434). The multi-story, 650,000-sq.-ft. building is a designated city landmark and the former home of Lord & Taylor.

t: Amazon.com: New York & Company
s: New York & Company is a leading specialty manufacturer and retailer of women's fashion apparel and accessories providing women with modern, wear to work solutions that are multi-functional at affordable prices. The Company was incorporated in 1918 and has been public since 2004.
